name: Space Gunner (B.Tashkov7)
description:
Space Gunner is a game where you are an austronaut and you need to detroy all asteroids. The goal is to score as many points as you can, but you only have three lives.  As you score more points through the game, the respawn time between asteroids decreases.

P.S. : This game is my submissionfor the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2
